content: <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>Denver Parks and Recreation</origin>         <pubdate>20110413</pubdate>         <title>Parks</title>         <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>This dataset is polygon representation of parks, golf courses, and recreation managed by the Department of Parks and Recreation in the City and County of Denver. Data is based on parcel ownership and does not include other areas maintained by the department such as medians and parkways.</abstract>       <purpose>This dataset should be used as reference to locate parks, golf courses, and recreation centers managed by the Department of Parks and Recreation in the City and County of Denver.   Data is based on parcel ownership and does not include other areas maintained by the department such as medians and parkways.The data should be used for planning and design purposes and cartographic purposes only.</purpose>     </descript>     <status>       <progress>Complete</progress>       <update>As needed</update>     </status>     <spdom>       <bounding>         <westbc>-105.110037</westbc>         <eastbc>-104.734005</eastbc>         <northbc>39.825192</northbc>         <southbc>39.612661</southbc>       </bounding>     </spdom>     <keywords>       <theme>         <themekt>None</themekt>         <themekey>parks</themekey>         <themekey>recreation</themekey>       </theme>       <theme>         <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Categories</themekt>         <themekey>boundaries</themekey>         <themekey>society</themekey>       </theme>       <place>         <placekt>None</placekt>         <placekey>Denver</placekey>         <placekey>Denver County</placekey>         <placekey>Colorado</placekey>         <placekey>USA</placekey>       </place>     </keywords>     <accconst>None</accconst>     <useconst>ACCESS CONSTRAINTS:  This dataset is provided as read-only and is restricted to City and County of Denver employees for official City business only.  Contact the GIS Administrator for more information on distribution requirements/restrictions.  USE CONSTRAINTS:  The City and County of Denver is not responsible and shall not be liable to the user for damages of any kind arising out of the use of data or information provided by the City and County of Denver, including the installation of the data or information, its use, or the results obtained from its use.   ANY DATA OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE City and County of Denver IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  Data or information provided by the City and County of Denver shall be used and relied upon only at the user's sole risk, and the user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the City and County of Denver, its officials, officers and mployees from any liability arising out of the use of the data/information provided.   NOT FOR ENGINEERING PURPOSES  </useconst>     <datacred>Denver Parks and Recreation</datacred>     <secinfo>       <secsys>AVAILABLE</secsys>       <secclass>Unclassified</secclass>       <sechandl>Available to the general public and posted on the Denver FTP (File Transfer Protocol) site.</sechandl>     </secinfo>     <native>Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.0.2414</native>   </idinfo>   <dataqual />   <spdoinfo>     <direct>Vector</direct>     <ptvctinf>       <sdtsterm>         <sdtstype>GT-polygon composed of chains</sdtstype>         <ptvctcnt>324</ptvctcnt>       </sdtsterm>     </ptvctinf>   </spdoinfo>   <spref>     <horizsys>       <geograph>         <latres>8.9831528411952133e-009</latres>         <longres>8.9831528411952133e-009</longres>         <geogunit>Decimal Degrees</geogunit>       </geograph>       <geodetic>         <horizdn>D WGS 1984</horizdn>         <ellips>WGS 1984</ellips>         <semiaxis>6378137.0</semiaxis>         <denflat>298.257223563</denflat>       </geodetic>     </horizsys>   </spref>   <eainfo>     <detailed>       <enttyp>         <enttypl>PARK_PARKLAND_A</enttypl>       </enttyp>       <attr>         <attrlabl>OBJECTID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Internal feature number.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHAPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Feature geometry.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Coordinates defining the features.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>LOCATION</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Name of the parkland.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>FORMAL_NAME</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Complete formal name of the park.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>LOC_CODE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Unique ID for the location used by Denver Parks and Recreation (DPR) staff.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>PARK_TYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Type of parkland.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>PARK_CLASS</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Park Classification - Athletic Multiuse Complex, Community, Golf, Mountain, Neighborhood, Open Space, Pocket, Rec Center, Regional or Special Use.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>GIS_ACRES</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Park acreage calculated from GIS software for the geometry of the polygon shown in this layer.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>DESIGNATED</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Is the park designated as park land which would inhibit certain types of development an/or encroachment - Yes, No, Partial.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>FIRST_AQ_DATE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Year of the first land acquisition associated for the park.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>MASTER_PLAN</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Year the park's master plan was developed or adopted.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>MAINT_DIST</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Park maintenance district in which the park is located.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>COUNCIL_DIST</attrlabl>         <attrdef>City Council District in which the property is located.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>POLICE_DIST</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Police district in which the park is located.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CROSS_STREETS</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Cross streets associated with the location of the property.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ADDRESS_ID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Address ID from the Denver Addressing Database.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Address Database</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ADDRESS_LINE1</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Address line 1.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ADDRESS_LINE2</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Address line 2.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CITY</attrlabl>         <attrdef>City name in which the park is located.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>STATE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Colorado.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ZIP</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A sequence of numbers added to a postal address to aid in the sorting of mail. Please do not direct mail to park property. </attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>LATITUDE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The angular distance north or south of the earth's equator, measured in degrees along a meridian, as on a map or globe.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>LONGITUDE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Angular distance on the earth's surface, measured east or west from the prime meridian at Greenwich, England, to the meridian passing through a position, expressed in degrees (or hours), minutes, and seconds.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>MARKETING_CODE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Marketing code for use on Denvergov.org.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>FACILITIES</attrlabl>         <attrdef>General listing of park facilities and amenities.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>DIAGRAM</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Network path to individual park maps.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>PHOTO</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Network path to photograph of the location.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>PARCEL_MATCH</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Does the geomotry in this layer match the assessor's parcel data layer - yes/no domain value.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>BND_QC</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Date in which the last quality check or update was performed for the record.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Parks and Recreation</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>GLOBALID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A field of type UUID (Universal Unique Identifier) in which values are automatically assigned by the geodatabase when a row is created. The GlobalID field is necessary for maintaining object uniqueness across replicas. All feature classes and tables participating in one-way or two-way replication must contain the GlobalID field. This field is not editable and is automatically populated when it is added for existing data. </attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHAPE_Length</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Length of feature in internal units.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHAPE_Area</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Area of feature in internal units squared.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>     </detailed>   </eainfo>   <distinfo>     <distrib>       <cntinfo>         <cntorgp>           <cntorg>City and County of Denver, Technology Services / DenverGIS Data</cntorg>         </cntorgp>         <cntaddr>           <addrtype>unknown</addrtype>           <address>201 W Colfax Ave, Dept 301</address>           <city>Denver</city>           <state>CO</state>           <postal>80202</postal>           <country>US</country>         </cntaddr>         <cntfax>720-913-5237</cntfax>         <cntemail>denvergis@denvergov.org</cntemail>         <hours>M-F 8:00am - 4:30pm (MT)</hours>       </cntinfo>     </distrib>     <distliab>See access and use constraints information.</distliab>     <stdorder>       <fees>This information is available at a time and material cost from the City and County of Denver. </fees>       <ordering>Use our online request form and acknowledge the GIS ordinance to download publically available GIS digital data. Please reference the following link - http://www.denvergov.org/gis and click on Products and Services, then click on Data Sales.; Technical Prerequisites: It is recommended to use DSL or T1 connections to download the information. If dial-up is used, please expect longer download times or incomplete data downloads.</ordering>       <turnarnd>Digital products can be downloaded for free using the FTP site or can be requested by filing out the GIS Data Request Form and faxing it to (720) 913-5237, ATTN: Data Sales. All digital orders will be confirmed and processed by DenverGIS. </turnarnd>     </stdorder>   </distinfo>   <metainfo>     <metd>20140116</metd>     <metstdn>FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn>     <metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv>     <mettc>local time</mettc>   </metainfo> </metadata>
